import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function EventRequest() { const [user, setuser] = useState([]) const [events, setEvents] = useState([]); useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/viewevent') .then(user=>setuser(user.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err)) } ,[]) const handleAccept = (id) => { axios.put(`http://localhost:4000/acceptevent/${id}`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data); // Update the status of the event in the local state const updatedEvents = events.map(event => { if (event._id === id) { event.status = 'Request Accepted'; } return event; }); setEvents(updatedEvents); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; return(

) } export default EventRequest
